entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
